title: Bihar STET 2025 online
description: The Bihar College Assessment Board (BSEB) has issued a notification on its website for the Bihar State Teacher Eligibility Test (BSTET/STET 2025). To apply for the STET, visit the official website, find the STET 2025 notification, and follow the instructions to complete and submit the online form. The application opens on September 19, 2025, and closes on October 5, 2025 (Extended). Candidates age must be between 21 and 42 years old as of August 1, 2025, to qualify. Review all required details before submitting the Bihar STET Online Form 2025.
qualification: 12th Pass
eligibility: For Class 9–10 Teachers which will have Paper-I, candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree in the subject which they applied with at least 50% marks and a B.Ed. degree. For Senior Secondary Teacher , you need a Postgraduate degree in the subject with Second Division with a B.Ed. degree (not required for Computer Science). Candidates belonging to SC/ST/EBC/BC/Divyang categories get 5% relaxation in marks.

title: BSSC Inter Level Bihar Recruitment 2025
description: The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has officially released the notification for the BSSC Inter Level Recruitment 2025, opening up a great opportunity for candidates who have completed their Intermediate (10+2) education. This recruitment aims to fill thousands of government vacancies across various departments in Bihar, making it one of the most awaited exams for state-level government job aspirants.The BSSC Inter Level Exam 2025 offers multiple posts such as Clerk, Revenue Worker, Panchayat Secretary, LDC, Typist, and other Group C positions. The selection process is designed to evaluate candidates' knowledge, aptitude, and suitability for clerical and administrative roles within the Bihar state government. Eligibility Criteria To apply for the BSSC Inter Level Recruitment 2025, candidates must have passed the Intermediate (10+2) examination from a recognized board in India. The age limit varies depending on the category: General (Male): 18 to 37 years, OBC / EBC (Male): up to 40 years, Female (All Categories): up to 40 years, SC / ST: up to 42 years Relaxation in the upper age limit will be applicable as per the government norms of Bihar. Application Process The application process for Bihar BSSC Inter Level 2025 is completely online through the official website bssc.bihar.gov.in. Candidates need to register themselves using a valid email ID and mobile number, fill out the application form with correct details, upload necessary documents, and pay the examination fee. The application fees are expected to be: ₹540 for General / OBC / EWS candidates, ₹135 for SC / ST / PH candidates and residents of Bihar Selection Process The recruitment process consists of two major stages: Preliminary Examination - Objective-type test based on General Studies, General Science, Mathematics, and Reasoning Ability. Main Examination - Candidates who qualify the prelims will be shortlisted for the main exam, which is more descriptive and post-oriented. The final selection will be based on the combined performance in both stages followed by document verification. Salary Structure Selected candidates under BSSC Inter Level 2025 will receive a pay scale of Level 2 to Level 5 as per the 7th Pay Commission, along with other allowances like DA, HRA, and medical benefits, depending on the post and department.
qualification: 12th Pass
eligibility: Candidates must have passed the 12th Class (Intermediate) examination from a recognized board or institution.
age:
Minimum Age : 18 Year
Maximum Age : 37 Years (UR Male)
Maximum Age : 40 Years (UR Female)
Maximum Age : 40 Years (BC/ EBC Male, Female)
Maximum Age : 42 Years (SC/ ST Male, Female)
Bihar BSSC provides age relaxation for the Inter Level as per their regulations.
howtoapply: Interested candidates who wish to apply for the BSSC post can submit their application online before 25 November 2025.Use the Apply button provided above in desktop and below in mobile phone under heading section to apply directly.Alternatively, visit the official website of BSSC to complete the application process online..

title: BSSC Office Attendant Bihar Recruitment 2025
description: Bihar BSSC Office Attendant Recruitment 2025 - Notification, Eligibility, and Details The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has officially announced the BSSC Office Attendant Recruitment 2025, offering an excellent opportunity for candidates seeking a stable government job in Bihar. This recruitment drive is aimed at filling Group D posts like Office Attendant (Karyalay Parichari) and other support staff positions across various government departments. Aspirants looking for secure employment in the Bihar government can apply online through the official website bssc.bihar.gov.in.OverviewThe BSSC Office Attendant Recruitment 2025 is one of the key job openings for matriculation (10th pass) candidates in Bihar. The role of an office attendant is vital in maintaining the smooth functioning of government offices. Employees are responsible for assisting officers, managing files, maintaining office cleanliness, delivering official documents, and supporting administrative operations. Eligibility Criteria To apply for the BSSC Office Attendant Recruitment 2025,candidates must meet the following requirements:Educational Qualification: The applicant must have passed Class 10 (Matriculation) from a recognized board. Age Limit:General (Male): 18 to 37 years OBC / EBC (Male): up to 40 years Female (All Categories): up to 40 years SC / ST (Male and Female): up to 42 years Domicile: The applicant must be a resident of Bihar to avail of reservation benefits.Relaxation in the upper age limit is applicable as per the Government of Bihar norms.Application Process The entire application process for Bihar BSSC Office Attendant Recruitment 2025 will be conducted online. Candidates can follow these steps: Visit the official website bssc.bihar.gov.in. Click on the Office Attendant Recruitment 2025 link. Register using a valid email ID and mobile number.Fill out the application form carefully with accurate personal and educational details. Upload the required documents such as a recent passport-size photograph and signature. Pay the application fee online. Application Fees:General / OBC / EWS: ₹540,SC / ST / PH / Female (Bihar Residents): ₹135, Selection Process The selection for BSSC Office Attendant 2025 will be based on the following stages:Written Examination - Objective questions on General Knowledge, Mathematics, and Reasoning.Document Verification - Qualified candidates will be called for verification of certificates and eligibility proof.Medical Test - Final stage to ensure the candidate's physical fitness for the post.Salary Structure: Candidates selected for the Office Attendant post will receive a pay scale under Level 1 (₹18,000 - ₹56,900) as per the 7th Pay Commission, along with other allowances such as DA, HRA, and medical benefits.
qualification: 10th Pass
eligibility: Candidates must have passed the 10th Class examination from a recognized board or institution.
age:
Minimum Age : 18 Year
Maximum Age : 37 Years (UR Male)
Maximum Age : 40 Years (UR Female)
Maximum Age : 40 Years (BC/ EBC Male, Female)
Maximum Age : 42 Years (SC/ ST Male, Female)
Bihar BSSC provides age relaxation for the Inter Level as per their regulations.
howtoapply: Interested candidates who wish to apply for the BSSC post can submit their application online before 14 October 2025.Use the Apply button provided above in desktop and below in mobile phone under heading section to apply directly.Alternatively, visit the official website of BSSC to complete the application process online..

title: UP SI Exam Date Declared 2025 Check Now
setPath: UP SI Exam Date Declared 2025 Check Now
organization: Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment & Promotion Board (UPPRPB)
description:
UP SI Exam Date 2025 Declared - The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment & Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has officially announced the UP Police Sub-Inspector (SI) Exam Date 2025. Candidates who have successfully registered for the UP Police SI Recruitment 2025 can now check the detailed schedule, exam timing, and venue details. The examination will be conducted in multiple shifts across the state of Uttar Pradesh. As per the notification, the UP SI written exam is tentatively scheduled in December 2025. Applicants are advised to keep visiting the official website uppbpb.gov.in and sarkariresult.rest for updates related to admit card release and exam instructions.

The UP Police SI recruitment is one of the most sought-after exams for candidates aspiring for a government job in the police department. The recruitment aims to fill Sub-Inspector (Civil Police), Platoon Commander, and Fire Officer posts. The written exam will consist of objective-type questions testing General Knowledge, Law & Constitution, Reasoning, and Numerical Aptitude.
qualification: Graduation in any discipline from a recognized university.
eligibility: Candidates must possess a Bachelor's Degree from a recognized university and meet the physical standards prescribed by UP Police. Minimum height for Male candidates - 168 cm (General/OBC/SC), 160 cm (ST); for Female candidates - 152 cm (General/OBC/SC), 147 cm (ST).
age:
Minimum Age: 21 Years
Maximum Age: 28 Years
Age relaxation is applicable as per government rules for reserved categories.
howtoapply: Candidates who have applied for the UP Police SI 2025 recruitment can check their exam date and schedule online. Visit the official website uppbpb.gov.in and navigate to the 'Exam Notice' section. Enter your registration number and date of birth to check your exam date, shift, and city details. Admit cards will be released 10 days prior to the exam.

title: SSC Delhi Police Constable Recruitment 2025 Apply Now
setPath: SSC Delhi Police Constable Recruitment 2025 Apply Now
description: SSC Delhi Police Constable Recruitment 2025 Apply Now - The Staff Selection Commission (SSC Delhi Police) has officially announced the SSC Delhi Police Constable Recruitment 2025. Eligible candidates who meet the educational and physical standards can now apply online. This recruitment drive aims to fill Constable (General Duty) posts across various units of Delhi Police. The application process, selection procedure, and eligibility criteria are clearly mentioned in the official notification. Candidates interested in a government job in law enforcement must not miss this opportunity to apply now. The recruitment includes multiple stages such as a written examination, physical efficiency test, medical examination, and document verification. The written exam consists of objective-type questions covering General Knowledge, Law & Constitution, Reasoning, Numerical Aptitude, and current affairs. Aspirants should carefully follow the official notification and start preparing accordingly to secure a position in Delhi Police. Stay updated with official SSC notifications and regularly check ssc.nic.in and sarkariresult.rest for the latest updates regarding the recruitment and application deadlines.
qualification: 10+2 pass from a recognized board or equivalent.
eligibility: Candidates must have passed 10+2 from a recognized board. Male and female candidates must meet the physical and medical standards prescribed by Delhi Police. Height, chest, and other parameters are as per the official notification.
age:

Maximum Age: 25 Years

salary: Rs. 21,700 - 69,100/- (Pay Level 3) along with allowances such as DA, HRA, and medical benefits.

Register with a valid email ID and mobile number, fill in all the personal and educational details, upload scanned documents including photograph and signature, pay the application fee, and submit the form before the last date. Candidates must keep a printout of the application form and fee receipt for future reference. It is mandatory to follow all instructions mentioned in the notification to avoid rejection.

title: UPSSSC Stenographer Eligibility Result 2025
organization: Uttar Pradesh Subordinate Services Selection Commission (UPSSSC)
description: UPSSSC Stenographer Eligibility Result 2025 - उत्तर प्रदेश अधीनस्थ सेवा चयन आयोग (UPSSSC) ने स्टेनोग्राफर पदों के लिए पात्रता परिणाम 4 अक्टूबर 2024 को जारी किया था। योग्य उम्मीदवारों को मुख्य परीक्षा में बैठने के लिए शॉर्टलिस्ट किया गया है। मुख्य परीक्षा की तिथि 16 नवंबर 2025 निर्धारित की गई है। उम्मीदवारों को सलाह दी जाती है कि वे आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर जाकर अपने परिणाम की जांच करें।

eligibility: उम्मीदवारों की आयु 18 से 40 वर्ष के बीच होनी चाहिए। आयु सीमा में छूट सरकारी नियमों के अनुसार लागू होगी।

description: UPSC NDA I Final Result 2025 - UPSC ने घोषित किया है NDA I Final Result 2025 जिसमें उम्मीदवारों के अंक भी शामिल हैं। इस परिणाम में चयनित होने वाले उम्मीदवारों की सूची और उनके प्राप्त अंक सार्वजनिक किए गए हैं। अब आप official PDF डाउनलोड कर सकते हैं और अपने रोल नंबर की स्थिति देखें।
qualification: उम्मीदवारों को 12वीं (Physics, Maths) उत्तीर्ण होना आवश्यक है।
eligibility: उम्मीदवार भारत के नागरिक होने चाहिए। उनके पास 12वीं (PCM) बोर्ड परीक्षा उत्तीर्ण होने चाहिए और योग्यता मानदंडों को पूरा करना चाहिए।
age: Age Limit: 16½ to 19½ Years (as per UPSC rules).
Post: National Defence Academy (NDA I) - Final Merit Based Selection
salary: NA (Training & Service Conditions as per Indian Armed Forces rules).
howtoapply: To check the UPSC NDA I Final Result 2025 with marks, visit the official UPSC website upsconline.nic.in (or upsconline.gov.in). Go to 'Recent Results' or 'Examination' section, click on the NDA I Final Result link. Download the PDF and search your roll number or name. The result list contains marks of candidates and final merit. Ensure to use Ctrl+F for quick search.
streetAddress: Union Public Service Commission, Dholpur House, Shahjahan Road

salary: As per Level 10 to Level 14 Pay Matrix of Rajasthan Government.

title: MPESB Group 2 Sub Group 3 Recruitment 2025 Apply Online for Various Posts
setPath: MPESB Group 2 Sub Group 3 Recruitment 2025 Apply Online for Various Posts
description: MPESB Group 2 Sub Group 3 Recruitment 2025 – Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has released a detailed notification for the Group 2 Sub Group 3 Combined Recruitment Examination 2025 for multiple technical and non-technical posts including Sanitary Inspector, Chemist, Lab Assistant, Junior Analyst and others. Candidates interested in MP government jobs can check here the eligibility criteria, exam pattern, syllabus, important dates, and online application process for MPESB Group 2 Sub Group 3 Recruitment 2025.

importantDates.admitCard: To be released 10 days before exam

qualification: Candidates should have completed Bachelor’s Degree / Diploma / 12th / ITI in the relevant trade or discipline from a recognized university or institute as per post requirement. Detailed post-wise qualification will be available in the official notification.

applicationFee.PaymentMode: Online through Debit Card, Credit Card, or Net Banking.

eligibility: Applicants must be citizens of India and residents of Madhya Pradesh will get domicile benefits. They must meet the educational qualification and age limit prescribed by MPESB. Candidates awaiting final results are not eligible.
age:
Minimum Age: 18 Years
Maximum Age: 40 Years (for male candidates)
Female / SC / ST / OBC (MP Residents): 45 Years
Age relaxation is applicable as per government rules.
Post:
Available Posts under MPESB Group 2 Sub Group 3:
1. Sanitary Inspector
2. Chemist
3. Lab Assistant
4. Water Quality Analyst
5. Junior Analyst
6. Technical Assistant
7. Other related technical and support staff positions
salary: Selected candidates will get a monthly salary as per the 7th Pay Commission Pay Matrix (Level-5 to Level-7) ranging from ₹25,300 – ₹91,300/- along with Dearness Allowance, HRA, and other government benefits.
examPattern: The MPESB Group 2 Sub Group 3 Examination 2025 will be conducted in Computer Based Test (CBT) mode. The question paper will have 200 questions for 200 marks covering subjects like General Knowledge, Mathematics, General Science, Reasoning Ability, General Hindi, General English and Professional Knowledge. Duration of the exam will be 3 hours. There is no negative marking.
syllabus:
Detailed syllabus includes topics from:
• General Knowledge – MP Current Affairs, Indian Constitution, Geography, Economy, History
• Reasoning & Math – Simplification, Series, Data Interpretation, Logical Problems
• Science – Physics, Chemistry, Biology (basic level)
• Technical Subjects – As per post related specialization (Chemistry, Environment Science, etc.)
howtoapply: Interested candidates can apply online through the official website of MPESB at https://esb.mp.gov.in/. Visit the official portal, click on the MPESB Group 2 Sub Group 3 Recruitment 2025 link, complete registration, fill out the online form, upload scanned documents, pay the application fee, and take a printout of the confirmation page for future reference.
selectionProcess: Selection will be based on Written Examination (CBT) followed by Document Verification. The merit list will be prepared based on marks obtained in the CBT.
examCenters: Major exam cities across Madhya Pradesh including Bhopal, Indore, Jabalpur, Gwalior, Ujjain, Rewa, Sagar, and Satna.

title: UP Home Guard Vacancy 2025 New Update Apply Online for 30,000+ Posts, Check Salary and Eligibility
description: up home guard recruitment – Uttar Pradesh Home Guard Department ne ek bade recruitment notification ka update release kiya hai jisme total 30,000+ posts ke liye bharti hone wali hai. Ye bharti un candidates ke liye ek golden opportunity hai jo UP government ke under kaam karna chahte hain. UP Home Guard Salary aur selection process ko is baar update kiya gaya hai. Yahan par aapko full detail milenge – qualification, age limit, selection process, physical test, aur step-by-step apply process tak.
qualification: Candidates ko kam se kam 10th ya 12th pass hona zaroori hai kisi recognized board se. Jinke paas NCC certificate, Defense background, ya Physical Training ka experience hai unko preference di jayegi.

applicationFee.PaymentMode: Online via Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking

eligibility: Applicant Indian Citizen hona chahiye aur Uttar Pradesh ka domicile hone par extra benefits milenge. Candidate physically fit hone chahiye aur medical test pass karna compulsory hai. Married, unmarried dono candidates apply kar sakte hain.
age:
Minimum Age: 18 Years
Maximum Age: 35 Years
Age relaxation SC/ST/OBC ke liye government norms ke according di jayegi.
Post:
UP Home Guard 2025 Available Posts:
1. Home Guard (Male)
2. Home Guard (Female)
3. Platoon Commander
4. Assistant Company Commander
5. Other Support Staff

Total Posts: Approx. 30,000+ across all UP districts.
salary: UP Home Guard Salary 2025: Abki baar salary structure ko revise kiya gaya hai. Pehle Home Guards ko daily duty ke basis par payment milta tha (₹500 – ₹700 per day), lekin naye update ke baad unhe monthly fixed honorarium milne wala hai. Expected monthly salary ₹21,000 – ₹25,000 tak ho sakti hai including DA, TA aur performance-based allowance. Permanent Home Guards ko pension aur insurance benefits bhi milenge.
examPattern: Recruitment process me koi written exam nahi hoga. Selection mainly Physical Efficiency Test (PET) aur Document Verification ke basis par hoga. Agar written exam conduct kiya gaya to usme General Knowledge, Reasoning, aur Current Affairs ke questions honge. Physical test ke liye male aur female candidates ke liye alag standards rakhe gaye hain.
syllabus:
Agar written exam conduct hota hai to syllabus me ye topics honge:
• General Knowledge – UP aur India ke current affairs, polity, history
• Reasoning – verbal & non-verbal reasoning
• Mathematics – simplification, ratio, average, time & distance
• Hindi Grammar aur comprehension
• Physical Fitness Test: 1600 meter run, push-ups, long jump, height aur chest measurement.

Is recruitment me discipline aur teamwork skills bhi check ki jayengi.
howtoapply:
Candidates ko apply karne ke liye official website par visit karna hoga – https://homeguard.up.gov.in/. Wahan ‘UP Home Guard Vacancy 2025 Apply Online’ link par click karein. Step-by-step process:
1. Registration karein apne valid mobile aur email se.
2. Form fill karein aur documents upload karein (photo, signature, ID proof).
3. Application fee online pay karein.
4. Form submit karne ke baad printout lein future reference ke liye.

Candidates ko form submit karte waqt sabhi documents sahi hone chahiye. Fake documents hone par application reject ho jayega.
selectionProcess:
Selection 3 stages me hoga:
1. Physical Efficiency Test (PET) – running, long jump, push-ups.
2. Document Verification – certificates aur ID proofs check honge.
3. Final Merit List – PET performance aur document verification ke base par.

Selected candidates ko training centre me 3 week ki basic training di jayegi jisme physical fitness, discipline aur civil security ke basics cover kiye jayenge.
examCenters: UP ke major districts me exam aur PET conduct honge jaise Lucknow, Kanpur, Varanasi, Gorakhpur, Prayagraj, Agra, Meerut, Bareilly, aur Noida.
benefits:
Home Guard ke post par serve karne wale candidates ko sirf salary nahi balki kaafi benefits bhi milte hain jaise:
• Medical facilities
• Life insurance cover
• Pension benefits (for permanent)
• Duty allowance aur performance bonus
• Uniform and travel allowance

Ye benefits UP government ke latest policies ke according update kiye gaye hain.

seo.metaTitle: UP Home Guard Vacancy 2025 New Update – Apply Online for 30,000+ Posts & Check Salary Details
seo.metaDescription: UP Home Guard Vacancy 2025 latest update out! Apply online for 30,000+ posts, check eligibility, age limit, UP Home Guard salary, selection process and important dates.
seo.keywords: UP Home Guard Vacancy 2025, UP Home Guard Salary, UP Home Guard Bharti 2025, UP Home Guard New Update, UP Sarkari Result
